title: Dell Ultra Sharp 27 Monitor
description: 27-inch QHD IPS monitor with 2560x1440 resolution, ultra-thin bezels and excellent color accuracy. Ideal for productivity, design work, and immersive entertainment experiences.

title: Samsung 24 Full HD Monitor
description: 24-inch Full HD monitor delivering sharp visuals and vibrant colors. Perfect for office work, browsing, streaming, and everyday tasks.

title: Logitech MX Master 3 Mouse
description: Advanced wireless mouse designed for productivity with ergonomic comfort, ultra-fast scrolling, and multi-device connectivity.

title: Razer DeathAdder Gaming Mouse
description: High-precision gaming mouse with RGB lighting and ultra-responsive sensor. Built for competitive gaming and smooth control.

title: Corsair Mechanical Keyboard
description: RGB mechanical keyboard featuring durable switches, customizable lighting effects, and solid aluminum frame construction.

title: HP 450 Programmable Wireless Keyboard
description: Slim wireless keyboard with long battery life, quiet typing experience, and modern minimalist design for home and office use.

title: WD 2TB External Hard Drive
description: Portable 2TB external hard drive with USB 3.0 connectivity. Perfect for backups, media storage, and expanding your digital space.

title: Seagate Expansion 1TB Portable HDD
description: Compact and reliable 1TB external hard drive with fast data transfer speeds and lightweight design.

title: Samsung 1TB SSD
description: High-speed 1TB solid state drive delivering fast boot times, improved system responsiveness, and reliable performance.

title: Kingston 500GB SSD
description: Reliable 500GB SATA SSD offering improved performance, faster load times, and enhanced durability.

title: ASUS Gaming Laptop
description: High-performance gaming laptop equipped with powerful processor, RTX graphics card, fast SSD storage, and immersive display.

title: Apple MacBook Air M2
description: Lightweight premium laptop powered by Apple M2 chip, featuring Retina display, silent performance, and all-day battery life.

title: TP-Link WiFi 6 Router
description: High-speed WiFi 6 router delivering improved coverage, stable connections, and smooth streaming for modern smart homes.

title: iPhone 17 Pro Max
description: Premium smartphone featuring powerful performance, advanced camera system, stunning OLED display, and long-lasting battery life.

title: Sony Noise Headphones
description: Wireless over-ear headphones with advanced active noise cancelling, rich sound quality, and long battery life.

title: JBL Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable waterproof Bluetooth speaker delivering powerful bass and clear sound. Perfect for outdoor parties, travel, and everyday music streaming.

title: Sony HD Webcam
description: Full HD webcam designed for video meetings, streaming, and online classes. Provides sharp image quality and smooth performance in various lighting conditions.

title: Canon PIXMA Printer
description: All-in-one wireless inkjet printer supporting printing, scanning, and copying. Ideal for home offices and students needing reliable document printing.

description: High-performance 8-core desktop processor built for gaming, multitasking, and content creation with excellent speed and efficiency.

title: NVIDIA RTX 4070 Card
description: Next-generation graphics card delivering high FPS gaming, ray tracing support, and exceptional performance for creators and gamers.

description: Premium ultra-light business laptop featuring Intel Core processor, durable carbon fiber design, and enterprise security features.

description: 27-inch gaming monitor with 165Hz refresh rate, 1ms response time, and smooth gameplay performance.

title: SteelSeries Gaming Headset
description: High-quality gaming headset with surround sound, noise-cancelling microphone, and comfortable ear cushions.

title: iPad Air 5th Gen M1 Chip 5G
description: Powerful tablet featuring Apple M1 chip, 10.9-inch Liquid Retina display, and support for Apple Pencil.

description: Ultra HD 4K webcam with HDR support, autofocus, and crystal-clear video conferencing quality.
